001import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import javax.swing.JDialog;
004import java.awt.BorderLayout;
005import javax.swing.JPanel;
006import java.awt.Color;
007import javax.swing.JLabel;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
010
011/**
012 * Décrivez votre classe TradeButton ici.
013 *
014 * @author (votre nom)
015 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
016 */
017public class TradeButton extends PopupButton implements ActionListener {
018    private UserInterface aUI;
019    private MC aMC;
020    
021    private JDialog aDialog;
022    private JPanel aMainPanel;
023    private JPanel aButtonPanel;
024    private JPanel aPNJPanel;
025    private JPanel aPNJLabelPanel;
026    private JPanel aPNJCenterPanel;
027    
028    private JLabel aPNJLabel;
029    private JLabel aTarget;
030    
031    private Color aBGColor;
032    private Color aTextColor;
033    private Color aHoverBGColor;
034    private Color aHoverTextColor;
035    
036    private ArrayList<String> aItems;
037
038    private CancelButton aCancelButton;
039    
040    public TradeButton(final String pText, final UserInterface pUI) {
041        super(pText);
042        this.aUI = pUI;
043        this.aMC = this.aUI.getGE().getMC();
044        
045        this.aBGColor = new Color(56, 51, 51);
046        this.aTextColor = new Color(245, 240, 240);
047        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(45, 40, 40);
048        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(155, 150, 150);
049        
050        this.aPNJLabel = new JLabel("Personnages :");
051        this.aPNJLabel.setForeground(Color.white);
052        
053        this.aItems = new ArrayList<String>();
054        
055        this.addActionListener(this);
056    }
057    
058    @Override
059    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
060        PopupButton.COMMAND_WORD = this.getText();
061        this.createDialog();
062    }
063    
064    public void createDialog() {
065        this.setPossibleItems();
066        
067        this.aDialog = new JDialog(this.aUI.getFrame(), JDialog.ModalityType.APPLICATION_MODAL);
068        this.aDialog.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
069        
070        this.aMainPanel = new JPanel();
071        this.aMainPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
072        this.aMainPanel.setBackground(new Color(20, 0, 0));
073        
074        // Panel des boutons confirmer et annuler
075        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
076        this.aButtonPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
077        
078        // panel avec les boutons des items
079        this.aPNJPanel = new JPanel();
080        this.aPNJPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
081        this.aPNJPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
082        
083        // panel pour le label Item
084        this.aPNJLabelPanel = new JPanel();
085        this.aPNJLabelPanel.add(this.aPNJLabel);
086        this.aPNJLabelPanel.setBackground(new Color(4, 51, 86));
087        
088        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJLabelPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
089    
090        this.aCancelButton = new CancelButton("Annuler", this.aDialog, this.aUI);
091        
092        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aCancelButton);
093        
094        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aPNJPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
095        this.aMainPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
096        
097        this.aPNJCenterPanel = new JPanel();
098        
099        this.addButtons();
100        
101        this.aDialog.add(aMainPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
102        this.aDialog.setSize(500, 300);
103        this.aDialog.setUndecorated(true);
104        this.aDialog.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
105        
106        this.aDialog.setVisible(true);
107    }
108    
109    private void addButtons() {
110        for(String vItemName : this.aItems) {
111            this.aPNJCenterPanel.add(new TargetButton(vItemName, this.aUI, this.aDialog));
112        }
113        this.aPNJPanel.add(this.aPNJCenterPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
114    }
115    
116    private void setPossibleItems() {
117        this.aItems.clear();
118        for(String vItemName : GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.keySet()) {
119            if(GameEngine.GAME_PNJ.get(vItemName).getCurrentRoom().equals(this.aMC.getCurrentRoom()))
120                this.aItems.add(vItemName);
121        }
122    }
123
